items.summary:
Over the weekend we caught a bunch of early launch discounts on some of Apple’s latest releases, not the least of which was its brand new AirPods Pro 3. Just after the first deliveries of iPhone 17 and iPhone Air models landed across the country, Amazon started to get aggressive with early discounts on some of the more sought-after accessories for the new handsets, including the first deal on the new AirPods Pro 3, price drops across the entire Apple case collection for iPhone 17, 17 Pro/Max, and iPhone Air, as well as its new MagSafe wallet colors.

items.title: Lenovo’s 14-inch 2-in-1 touchscreen Chromebook Flex 5i hits lowest price of the year at $140 off
items.summary:
As part of its Deals of the Day offers, Best Buy is offering Lenovo’s Flex 5i Chromebook Plus notebook for $359 shipped. This Chromebook normally sells for $499 and is still listed at full price on Lenovo’s site, but you can grab it now with a $140 discount. Only once before today have we seen this model go for less, and this deal comes within $10 of that all-time low. Today’s discounted price is, in fact, $40 less than our previous mention from earlier this year, making it the best price we’ve tracked in 2025. Head below for more details.

items.title: Trump hits H-1B visas with $100,000 fee, targeting the program that launched Elon Musk and Instagram
